title: Cover Picture and Issue Information
content:
Cover image: Fire fighters use a cool evening to apply prescribed burns in a South African savanna. New research uses high-resolution Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) to investigate the long-term effects of fire manipulation on grass structure and grazing lawn establishment in Kruger National Park, South Africa. (pp.1531–1545).

Photo: © Jason E. Donaldson.
siteTitle: Wiley: Journal of Applied Ecology: Table of Contents
